channel.title: Can only do mage attacks?
channel.description: So I am trying to use add an npc but by default you can only mage this npc cant use range against him or attack have to mage only, how do I change this to where you can attack him with anything.

item.title: Can only do mage attacks?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

hadlich4:

So I am trying to use add an npc but by default you can only mage this npc cant use range against him or attack have to mage only, how do I change this to where you can attack him with anything.

Your server probably has the godwars dungeon npcs added in…

Look for the armadyl npcs in your combat as they’re range/mage only (Most servers send a message like: “You can only range/mage armadyl creeps!”).

If not, it’d be in your combat assistant in the methods that start the attack (iirc it’s attacknpc) and then the attack packets.

Read full topic
